fetch.user_auth: SELECT username, displayname, password FROM user WHERE username='%s'
fetch.user_id: SELECT id FROM user WHERE username='%s'
fetch.post_url_path: SELECT url_path FROM post WHERE url_path='%s'

create.user: INSERT INTO user (username, displayname, password) VALUES ('%s', '%s', '%s')
create.post: INSERT INTO post (title, content, description, url_path, programming_language, publisher_id) VALUES ('%s', '%s', '%s', '%s', '%s', '%s')
